nodes.text: Operation Molten Splinter was a two-part military operation carried out by the Imperial Navy during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The Empire's Fury squadron and the Imperial Navy defended Republic defector Boro Fareed in the Taspan system, and wiped out the Ezran pirates.
